content:
## Timeblocks

### v1

```plain text
7:30 | Wake Up
7:30 - 9:00 | Fix loading screen on blog; also incorporate task list snapshots on timeblocks page
9:00 - 10:00 | Look into implementing sleep diary
```

## Routines

### Morning Routine

```plain text
7:00        | Wake Up
7:00 - 7:15 | Brush Teeth, Make Bed, Place Kindle on Pillow
7:15 - 7:30 | Breakfast
```

### Evening Routine

```plain text
22:00 - 22:25 | Check email; Create timeblock for next day
22:25 - 22:30 | Clear desk; Plug in devices
22:30 - 22:45 | Brush teeth; Quick shower
22:45 - 23:15 | Reading
23:15         | Bedtime; experiment with playing Weightless
```
